body:
I just wanted to say gratz to AWarriorVenom for becoming Map Dev - thank you Avicus for getting a new Map Dev in only shortly after the shock retirement of Evocal and ParaSpider. You have already made good maps, AwarriorVenom, so thank you, and good luck with being Map Dev.

iBiZa_MiNeCrAfT

title: Congratulations AWarriorVenom

replies.body:
Congratulations, and itaily was promoted to Map Dev as well.

EDIT : Also, Evocal and TheMasterCow are Map Developers once again.
